root.name: Mole Control
root.description: OverviewDefeat the moles in this Minesweep inspired game. The story behind the game is that moles have invaded your town and you have to deal with them. A strange ufo-like invention from your professor allows you to find and smash the moles. In the game you have to find out why the moles are invading your town by clearing the levels. During these fights the moles can fight back.System RequirementsOS: Windows XP SP2 or higherProcessor: 1.6 GHz or higherMemory: 512MBHard Drive: 250 MBGraphics: Integrated Graphics with DirectX 9.0c, Shader 2.0 and 16 MB of shared video memorySound: DirectX 9.0c compatibleDirectXÂ®: DirectX 9.0c
